name: part_006
file: tmp_【＃一条莉々華生誕祭2025】初の生誕ライブ開幕！！一条莉々華生誕祭ライブ2025【一条莉々華⧸hololive DEV_IS　ReGLOSS】 [HB8sU0qsePE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'WAO!!' by Ichijou Ririka and Hakui Koyori.
Performance of the song 'FACT' by Ichijou Ririka and Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: 見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: Looking for me,

subtitles.original: 僕は君を迎えに行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'm coming to pick you up.

subtitles.original: 出会えたならハッピー
subtitles.english: Meeting you is happiness.

subtitles.original: わおっ！わおっ！
subtitles.english: WAO! WAO!

subtitles.original: お助けじゃえ
subtitles.english: Help is here!

subtitles.original: 鳴いて 泣いて 愛して しっぽ振って
subtitles.english: Howl, cry, love, and wag your tail!

subtitles.original: わおっ！わおっ！
subtitles.english: WAO! WAO!

subtitles.original: お助けじゃえ
subtitles.english: Help is here!

subtitles.original: なめるな僕をどうか覚えておいて
subtitles.english: Don't underestimate me, please remember me.

subtitles.original: もう君の心チクッとしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Let your heart feel a little sting.

subtitles.original: もうどうしようとかたまに思っちゃって沈んだり
subtitles.english: Sometimes I wonder what to do and feel down,

subtitles.original: 案外いけるかもふわり飛んじゃってもっとだーっと
subtitles.english: But maybe you can do it, just fly away further and further.

subtitles.original: べったりがやめられない
subtitles.english: I can't stop being clingy.

subtitles.original: おすわりってそれなんだっけ？
subtitles.english: What was 'sit' again?

subtitles.original: うっかりが止められない
subtitles.english: I can't stop being careless.

subtitles.original: またズンて壁に当たるの
subtitles.english: I hit into the wall again.

subtitles.original: わんわんステップアップ死んだふりしてるの
subtitles.english: Wan-wan step up, I'm playing dead.

subtitles.original: やめて はい こっちおいで
subtitles.english: Stop it. Okay, come over here.

subtitles.original: 欲しがる君とあげすぎな僕とで
subtitles.english: With you wanting more and me giving too much,

subtitles.original: もっといける気がしています
subtitles.english: I feel like we can go further.

subtitles.original: あっ
subtitles.english: Ah.

subtitles.original: あっちゃっ ちゃっ
subtitles.english: Oh my...

subtitles.original: びっくりするほどできないじゃん
subtitles.english: I'm surprisingly incapable,

subtitles.original: 間違って悩んだりばっかりじゃん
subtitles.english: Always making mistakes and worrying.

subtitles.original: 手だっ
subtitles.english: Give me your hand!

subtitles.original: 見つけてほしくて
subtitles.english: Looking for me,

subtitles.original: 僕は君を迎えに行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'm coming to pick you up.

subtitles.original: 出会えたならハッピー
subtitles.english: Meeting you is happiness.

subtitles.original: だって
subtitles.english: Because...

subtitles.original: やっぱり一人じゃダメだけど
subtitles.english: Being alone is no good after all.

subtitles.original: 集まって馬鹿してわおっちゃえば
subtitles.english: If we gather and goof around and 'WAO',

subtitles.original: ほら いつでも言える「おかえり」
subtitles.english: See, we can always say 'Welcome back'.

subtitles.original: 僕は君に伝えたいんだ大いなるハッピー
subtitles.english: I want to convey to you this great happiness.

subtitles.original: わおっ！わおっ！
subtitles.english: WAO! WAO!

subtitles.original: お助けじゃえ
subtitles.english: Help is here!

subtitles.original: 鳴いて 泣いて 愛して しっぽ振って
subtitles.english: Howl, cry, love, and wag your tail!

subtitles.original: わおっ！わおっ！
subtitles.english: WAO! WAO!

subtitles.original: お助けじゃえ
subtitles.english: Help is here!

subtitles.original: なめるな僕をどうか覚えておいて
subtitles.english: Don't underestimate me, please remember me.

subtitles.original: 目指す
subtitles.english: Aiming for...

subtitles.original: キラキラもきっと僕次第だ
subtitles.english: Shining moments are surely up to me.

subtitles.original: ピカピカなんてものはないんだからさ
subtitles.english: Since there's no such thing as 'perfect',

subtitles.original: メラメラでブチギレしないで
subtitles.english: Don't get so heated and blow up.

subtitles.original: はぐれずに希望へ大爆走
subtitles.english: Let's dash together towards hope without getting lost.

subtitles.original: 君の心チクッとしちゃっていいじゃんハッピーちゃん
subtitles.english: It's okay to let your heart sting a bit, Happy-chan.

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に囚われたまま 奏でる悲鳴を
subtitles.english: While trapped in the eternal darkness, the screams played...

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear them.

subtitles.original: さあ爪を磨いたら まだ子供のようなあなたの為に
subtitles.english: Now, once I've sharpened my claws, for you who are still like a child.

subtitles.original: ああ試されたいなら その愚かな手に手錠をかけて
subtitles.english: Ah, if you wish to be tested, put handcuffs on those foolish hands.

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に囚われたまま 甘い甘いガムを噛んでた
subtitles.english: While trapped in the eternal darkness, I was chewing sweet, sweet gum.

subtitles.original: いくつもの後悔をさあ捧げて
subtitles.english: Come, offer up your many regrets.

subtitles.original: 何気ない合図に隠れて 答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual signal, I'll let you know the answer soon.

subtitles.original: 微かな嘘に塗れた 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: Smothered in faint lies, I'll accept you even as you refuse.

subtitles.original: ほら悲鳴を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Now, let me hear your screams.

subtitles.original: さあ指を鳴らしたら この子猫のような私の為に
subtitles.english: Now, if you snap your fingers, for me who is like this kitten.

subtitles.original: ああ喉が渇いたわ 薄紅の口に指を散らして
subtitles.english: Ah, my throat is parched, scatter your fingers on my crimson mouth.

subtitles.original: 狭い牢屋に閉じ込めたまま 首輪に繋がれたいの
subtitles.english: While locked in a small cage, I want to be bound by a collar.

subtitles.original: くだらないルールじゃ奪えない 自由は既にこの手の中にある
subtitles.english: Unimportant rules cannot take it away; freedom is already in these hands.

subtitles.original: 愛情では計れない 弱ったままに選ばせてあげる
subtitles.english: It cannot be measured by affection, I'll let you choose while you're weakened.

subtitles.original: ほら心を開いて
subtitles.english: Now, open your heart.

subtitles.original: 分からないふりをして 寝ぼけてるの
subtitles.english: Pretending not to understand, are you half-asleep?

subtitles.original: もっと熱い暗闇見せて ねえ
subtitles.english: Show me a hotter darkness, won't you?

subtitles.original: 何気ない合図に隠れて 答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: Hidden in a casual signal, I'll let you know the answer soon.

subtitles.original: 微かな嘘に塗れた 拒んだままに受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: Smothered in faint lies, I'll accept you even as you refuse.

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に刻むその名を 分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll let you know that name carved into the eternal darkness.

subtitles.original: ほら悲鳴を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Now, let me hear your screams.

subtitles.original: 夢見ないで ほら聞かせて
subtitles.english: Don't dream, now let me hear them.
